items.title: Add worker bundle size guardrail in CI
items.summary: Fail the deploy workflow when the gzipped OpenNext worker exceeds the defined budget.

items.title: Back ISR by R2 + Durable Object queue
items.summary: Enable the OpenNext R2 incremental cache and bind the queue/tag Durable Objects in wrangler.toml.

items.title: Adopt Cache Components for marketing shell
items.summary: Turn on experimental cache components and tag-based caching for site settings and marketing content.

items.title: Stream marketing sections with Suspense
items.summary: Wrap long-running marketing sections in Suspense boundaries with server fallbacks.

items.title: Provide layout-level metadata defaults
items.summary: Expose canonical metadata from the root layout when page-level metadata is absent.

items.title: Align static header generator with security policy
items.summary: Regenerate public/_headers via script with stricter CSP and shared caching semantics.

items.title: Expose font preconnect hints from the worker
items.summary: Attach Link headers for critical font origins when returning HTML.

items.title: Protect signup with Cloudflare Turnstile
items.summary: Embed the Turnstile widget on signup and verify tokens server-side.

items.title: Add authenticated cache tag revalidation API
items.summary: Provide an admin endpoint that revalidates cache tags via authenticated webhook calls.

items.title: Reset static-config caches after tag refresh
items.summary: Clear in-memory marketing/site settings caches whenever cache tags are revalidated to avoid stale isolates.

items.title: Switch Next Image to Cloudflare Images loader
items.summary: Requires asset migration and delivery hash; keep on hold until Cloudflare Images is provisioned.
